name: James Brown
shortDescription: James Brown was and American musician. He was known as 'the grandfather of soul' and 'the hardest working man in show business'. James died 2006.

name: Prince
shortDescription: Prince was an American singer-songwriter and multi-instrumentalist. He was known for his unique style and prolific output of music. Prince passed away in 2016.

name: Madonna
shortDescription: Madonna is an American singer, songwriter, and actress known for her reinvention and influence on pop culture.

name: John Lennon
shortDescription: John Lennon was an English musician, singer, and songwriter, best known as a member of the Beatles. He was tragically assassinated in 1980.

name: Adele
shortDescription: Adele is a British singer-songwriter known for her powerful vocals. She has won multiple Grammy Awards.

name: Michael Jackson
shortDescription: Michael Jackson was an American singer, songwriter, and dancer. He is often called the 'King of Pop'. Michael passed away in 2009.

name: Bob Dylan
shortDescription: Bob Dylan is an American singer-songwriter and Nobel laureate. He is a major figure in the folk and rock music scenes.
